name: >Welcome to the Mason mansion<
description:
Welcome to the Mason Mansion, a place abandoned since 1866 and found by you after a car crash. You enter the mansion in hope to find someone, but little did you know that in this mansion lies the soul of the youngest son of the Masons. Can you find the secrets of this abandoned mansion or get lost and forgoten.

Controles:

W, A, S, D - move around

Mouse- Move camera around.

Note: this is my first 3d project.
